item.title: Google Mock: Override EXPECT_CALL
item.description: EXPECT_CALL is not overridable. This does not mean that you cannot have multiple EXPECT_CALLs for the same function.

item.title: Google Mock: ON_CALL + EXPECT_CALL
item.description: A short post about how ON_CALL and EXPECT_CALL can complement each other. It is worth remembering that EXPECT_CALL does not “override” behaviors defined by ON_CALL. Both of these macros can be used simultaneously on the same mock.

item.title: A reflection on the success of Steve Jobs based on the book "Steve Jobs" by Walter Isaacson
item.description: At university I was given an assignment to read the book ‘Steve Jobs’ by Walter Isaacson and write down my thoughts. The goal was to extract clues and maybe even advice that could help repeat the kind of spectacular success that the Apple founder achieved. Years later, I found this essay and thought it was interesting enough to be published. You can read it below.

item.title: How this blog was created
item.description: It is now standard for me to open each of my new blogs with a post about how they came to exist. I already have at least 5 blogs behind me, each built on a different technology. This time I decided to use Hugo.
